snippet: With the the two best records in the American League, the Yankees and the Rangers seem destined to meet in a couple of months, and the players are not afraid to say it.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column observes that with the two best records in the American League, the New York Yankees and the Texas Rangers seem destined to meet in the postseason, and the players are not afraid to say it.
lead_paragraph: With the the two best records in the American League, the Yankees and the Rangers seem destined to meet in a couple of months, and the players are not afraid to say it.

headline.seo: Yankees and Rangers: See You in October
headline.main: Yankees and Rangers: See You in October
headline.print_headline: Yankees and Rangers: See You in October
